analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.purchaseTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#1015-1083):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.transfer(contributor,tokensToPurchase)) (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#1067-1071)
	External calls sending eth:
	- contributor.transfer(refund) (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#1074-1077)
	- wallet.transfer(weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#1077)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- hasContributed (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#1078)

Crowdsale.addPresale (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#984-1014) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- availableTokensToPurchase == 0

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol:
	Contract Ledger has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#504-506)
	 - revokeAllocation (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#509-547)
	 - claimTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#602-634)
	 - claimBonus (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#635-681)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.addPresale (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#984-1014):
	External calls:
	- availableTokensToPurchase = tokenContract.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#997-998)
	- require(bool)(ledgerContract.addAllocation(_contributor,luckys,bonusLuckys,_contributorPhase)) (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#1002-1004)
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.transfer(address(ledgerContract),totalTokens)) (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#1005-1006)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalTokensSold (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#1007-1008)

Reentrancy in Ledger.revokeAllocation (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#509-547):
	External calls:
	- currentSupply = tokenContract.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#531-533)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalPrivateAllocation (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#540-541)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.revokePresale (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#966-981):
	External calls:
	- luckys = ledgerContract.revokeAllocation(_contributor,_contributorPhase) (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#975-977)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalTokensSold (/unique_chucks/4/0xa76ea481aebdd5703e476cfcb2315d4e014232c1.sol#980)
